import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./services.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const servicesData=[{id:1,title:'Nutritional Consultation',description:'Personalized consultations to assess your dietary needs and health goals.',price:'Starting at $50'},{id:2,title:'Meal Planning',description:'Customized meal plans that fit your lifestyle and dietary preferences.',price:'Starting at $30'},{id:3,title:'Weight Management Programs',description:'Programs designed to help you achieve and maintain a healthy weight.',price:'Contact for pricing'},{id:4,title:'Fitness and Nutrition Workshops',description:'Workshops focusing on the relationship between diet and fitness.',price:'Contact for pricing'}];const OurServices=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"our-services-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"services-title",children:"Our Services"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"services-cards",children:servicesData.map(service=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/AppointmentForm`,className:"service-card-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"service-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"card-title",children:service.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-description",children:service.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-price",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:service.price})})]})},service.id))})]});};export default OurServices;
